title: Energy and potential of plates if capacitor change

content.question: When charges Q of equal magnitude and opposite sign are placed on the plates of a parallel-plate capacitor of capacitance C, the voltage between the plates is V and the energy stored in the capacitor is U. If C is doubled and Q is not changed, how are V and U affected?

choices.label: V U Not changed Not changed

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
